item.title: About
item.description: Attributions # This theme depends on the following projects: Powered by Hugo Color scheme based on Gruvbox Code Highlighting by Prism Tabler Icons Simple Icons Content with the #hugo-basic-example tag originates from gohugoio/hugoBasicExample A big thanks to the creators! ❤️ The profile picture of Richard Hendricks is from the Fandom Silicon Valley Wiki. item.title: Awards
item.description: 2014-2015 Technology and Engineering EMMY Award 2015-12-31 The National Academy of Television Arts and Sciences Pioneering Development of Data Driven Traffic System for Multichannel Environments I was the team lead of the development Crossroad team that won this award.

item.title: Education
item.description: Computer Science (Bachelor's Degree) 1983-12-31 - 1986-12-31 Southern Polytechnic State University 3.9/4.0 - High Honors

item.title: Experience
item.description: Director of Cloud Services 2019-07-31 - present Equifax Alpharetta, Georgia, United States Leading the engineering team that builds the core infrastructure security blocks to allow Equifax to migrate to the Google Cloud Platform and comply with FedRAMP standards. Established best practices for managing Google Kubernetes Engine and created Terraform automation that teams can use create clusters that meet high Equifax security standards. Continuing to bring new functionality such as Anthos Service Mesh and Anthos Configuration Manger as part of the Equifax standard for GKE.

item.title: Profile
item.description: Robert Cannon Director of Cloud Services rob@cannonsoftware.com 404-452-0240 I am a technology professional with experience in a wide variety of platforms and technology that can work at the senior leadership level as well as work with a technical team to deliver great solutions. I build great teams and cultivate a prominent level of talent. I have combined my experiences as a developer and a software engineer to automate application delivery long before DevOps became an industry term.

item.title: Skills
item.description: IT Management () Strategic Planning, Vendor Management, Audit Compliance, Security Compliance, Business Continuity, Agile Planning, Enterprise Architecture, SDLC, Budgets Public Clouds () GCP, AWS, Azure Platform Technologies () Kubernetes, Docker, Serverless, Elastic Search, Prometheus Compliance () FedRAMP, SOX, PCI Tools () Terraform, Packer, PowerShell, Microsoft Office DevOps () GitHub Actions, Azure Devops, Jenkins, Continuous Integration Programming Languages ()

item.title: Volunteering
item.description: Web Developer 2010-12-31 - 2012-12-31 Lighthouse Family Retreat I developed a web site to track volunteer information and to register families with children with cancer.
